title: Brunchit
address: Two locations: Malasaña, Calle de Augusto Figueroa 33 (Chueca)
description: Born in Bali 6 years ago, Brunchit brings exotic brunch experience to Madrid. No reservations needed. Organic coffee, sourdough bread, variety of toasts (avocado, eggs Benedict, salmon), sweet/salty pancakes, colorful bowls, burgers. Vegan and vegetarian options. Eco-natural smoothies and cocktails. Open daily 9am-4pm.
